name: Western Copper and Gold Corporation
description: Western Copper and Gold Corporation is a leading exploration and development company focused on advancing its flagship project, the Casino Project, located in the Yukon Territory of Canada. The Casino Project is one of the largest undeveloped copper-gold-silver deposits in North America, and it boasts significant resources of copper, gold, and silver. The company is committed to sustainable mining practices and has made strides in its environmental management plans to ensure minimal impact on the surrounding environment. Founded in 2006, Western Copper and Gold has been dedicated to acquiring and developing mineral properties with rich resources, primarily focusing on copper and gold. The company’s strategy includes leveraging its exploration capabilities to unlock the potential of its projects while maintaining strong relationships with local communities and stakeholders. Western Copper and Gold seeks to play a crucial role in meeting the growing demand for copper, which is essential for renewable energy technologies and electric vehicles. With a strong management team and a solid financial position, the company is well-positioned to capitalize on the opportunities within the mining sector and contribute to the sustainable development of the industry.

seo.meta_title: Western Copper and Gold Corporation | Leading Explorer in Mining
seo.meta_description: Explore Western Copper and Gold Corporation, a leader in mining with a focus on the Casino Project in the Yukon Territory. Discover our commitment to sustainable mining.

faq.question: What is the Casino Project?
faq.answer: The Casino Project is one of the largest undeveloped copper-gold-silver deposits in North America, located in the Yukon Territory.

faq.question: When was Western Copper and Gold founded?
faq.answer: Western Copper and Gold was founded in 2006.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Western Copper and Gold?
faq.answer: Paul West-Sells is the CEO of Western Copper and Gold Corporation.

faq.question: What minerals does Western Copper and Gold focus on?
faq.answer: Western Copper and Gold focuses on copper, gold, and silver mining.

faq.question: Where is Western Copper and Gold headquartered?
faq.answer: Western Copper and Gold is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
